findings.title: Remediation for tracking request IDs and rewards
findings.description: A better approach might be to keep track of this data per request and reward accordingly no matter when the results arrive.

findings.title: Chainlink-based oracles use Ropsten job IDs
findings.description: This constant and other Chainlink job IDs are for the Ropsten test network.

findings.title: Oracle uses low-level call unnecessarily
findings.description: The Oracle contract uses a low-level call unnecessarily.

findings.title: Use of constant functions instead of pure/view
findings.description: Using `constant` functions instead of `pure` or `view` can make it easier to port the code to Solidity 0.5.x and has built-in security benefits.

findings.title: loanExpiration should be renamed in the collateral swap provider
findings.description: The parameter loanExpiration is misnamed. It's not actually the loan expiration, but rather the last time an auction winner can claim the collateral he won in the auction.
